fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Is political power distributed according to gender?

fxInfo_responses.value: Men have a near-monopoly on political power.
Men have a dominant hold on political power. Women have only marginal influence.
Men have much more political power but women have some areas of influence.
Men have somewhat more political power than women.
Men and women have roughly equal political power.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2pepwrgen, *_osp, *_ord
